TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pens extends System.Object

summary.span: 所有标准颜色的钢笔。

span.span: Pens for all the standard colors.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此类的对象是不可变，这意味着不能更改其属性。The objects returned by this class are immutable, meaning their properties cannot be changed. 若要看到表示通过此类中的钢笔颜色，请参阅[按名称的颜色](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332)。To see the colors represented by pens in this class, see [Colors by Name](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332). ## Examples 以下方法演示如何使用类。The following method demonstrates how to use the class. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`UsePensClass`方法时处理该窗体的事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `UsePensClass` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
